channel.title: Comments on: Absolutely positively Crystal Castles obsessed

item.title: By: dr ops
item.dc:creator: dr ops
item.description:
crystal castles have already lost all cred by lying that they knew nothing of the scene and chiptune artists that it's now been proven that they sampled heavily
then they disrespect their fans by lying to the press about it.
http://www.pileup.com/babyart/blog/?p=130
or just google 'crystal castles steal'
item.content:encoded:
crystal castles have already lost all cred by lying that they knew nothing of the scene and chiptune artists that it’s now been proven that they sampled heavily

then they disrespect their fans by lying to the press about it.

http://www.pileup.com/babyart/blog/?p=130

or just google ‘crystal castles steal’

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Thats because you are all braindead hipsters who only have developed taste for hipster garbage. unfortuantely this is just further proving that you can get away with making minimally creative tired subpar music aslong as it sounds similar to old creative bands of yesteryear. and seeing them live is just uneventful.
item.content:encoded: Thats because you are all braindead hipsters who only have developed taste for hipster garbage. unfortuantely this is just further proving that you can get away with making minimally creative tired subpar music aslong as it sounds similar to old creative bands of yesteryear. and seeing them live is just uneventful.

item.title: By: ryan97ou
item.dc:creator: ryan97ou
item.description:
thanks for the links man.
as for being on the edge about CC...i was the same way. see them live...your opinion will change. mine did instantly.
item.content:encoded:
thanks for the links man.

as for being on the edge about CC…i was the same way. see them live…your opinion will change. mine did instantly.

item.title: By: Kevin Langston
item.dc:creator: Kevin Langston
item.description:
I would be listening to the new R.E.M. right now, but the copy I just bought came without the fucking CD.
No shit. No joke.
What the fuck?
item.content:encoded:
I would be listening to the new R.E.M. right now, but the copy I just bought came without the fucking CD.

No shit. No joke.

What the fuck?

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: I think I need to do a little more listening before I form an opinion about CC. I mean, I want to like them, I'm just not sure I do at the moment.
item.content:encoded: I think I need to do a little more listening before I form an opinion about CC. I mean, I want to like them, I’m just not sure I do at the moment.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Are you harshing on my obsession?! Come on, man. It's not like it's "Your Party." What are you listening to these days? By all means, don't let me monopolize the drawer.
item.content:encoded: Are you harshing on my obsession?! Come on, man. It’s not like it’s “Your Party.” What are you listening to these days? By all means, don’t let me monopolize the drawer.
